job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: brHi brbrWe are have an opportunity for the below job We will request you to revert back with your resume brbrPosition Data ScientistbrLocation Plano TX Currently Remote  Will be Onsite until the further announcementbrDuration Long TermbrJob DescriptionbrbrDuties to Performbr	Build proofofconcept models using a prototype infrastructurebr	Bring proofofconcept models into production using prototype infrastructurebr	Communicate shortcomings or improvements to multilanguage API for database interactionbr	Build proofofconcept feature engineering batch and streaming jobs br	Create and present Powerpoint decks describing work to both technical and nontechnical audiencesbr	Assist in design and brainstorming sessions for prototype capabilitiesbrbrRequired Skill  Experiencebr	Expert in Azure Cloud Machine Learning Event HubStreaming Analytics HDI DB Azure ML Azure Log Analytics Databricksbr	Strong statistics and machine learning fundamentalsbr	Demonstrated experience putting models into realtime production br	Experience with Python required R Scala and Java nice to havebr	Experience with Spark DataFrame and SQL APIs required  Spark streamingstructured streaming are nice to havebr	Experience with Azure Cloudbr	Experience with DatabricksSpark Delta Lake MLFlowbr	Experience with H2O Driverless AIbr	Experience with KafkaAzure Event Hubbr	Strong Team Playerbr	Strong problemsolving skillsbr	Strong communication skills and the ability to describe shortcomings in system designbr	A strong desire and ability to learn new tools and technologiesbr	Airflow experience is nice to havebrbrTechnical Environmentbr	Azurebr	SQL  Mongo DBbr	Python  Pysparkbr	Kafka  EventHubbr	Linux and Shell Scriptingbr	Possibly R Scala and Javabr	Databricksbr	Azure data production and consumption tools Event Hub Azure Functions Streaming AnalyticsbrbrRegardsbrSuganya brbrWhats app 91 9043392040 br
